name: Blob Frog the Fisherman
description:
Blob Frog the Fisherman is a casual fishing game with up gradable equipment and an element of excitement from saving other Blob animals from the water.

You play as Blob Frog in a post-nuclear war world. Humans have nuked each other and have vanished. The radiation has created a new species called Blob animals, a rounder, softer version of the original species. They are now the most intelligent species on earth and they base their life around recycling!

Your mission is to be the new worlds first fisher. You go out to fish for trash floating in the water to build your city and make a home for the Blob kind. The Blob animals can't swim and sometimes they accidentally end up in the water, you will need to save them.

Notice: Some of the buttons don't work after pushing so just keep clicking until they do.
